title: 縺ｾ縺驥手除繧帝｣溘∋縺ｦ繧具ｼ溘◎繧後∬・繧堤ｴ螢翫＠縺ｦ縺ｾ縺吶ｈ
script_en: Still eating vegetables? That's like slowly killing yourself. Lectins and oxalates in vegetables are destroying your gut. Plants can't move, so they produce lectin proteins to protect themselves from predators. These lectins attack your intestinal lining, causing leaky gut syndrome. Moreover, oxalates found in spinach and bamboo shoots bind with calcium to form kidney stones and block mineral absorption. Humans have evolved eating large mammal fat and meat for over 2 million years. We weren't designed to break down plants. Start eating 'meat only' today and stop the inflammation in your body.
